item.title: 《The Housing Boom and Bust》
item.description: Preface to the Revised Edition Two financial writers for the New York Times summarized the current situation in housing and in the economy this way: Real estate, which has traditionally brought the economy out of recession, seems increasingly likely this time to hold it back. The housing market’s epic boom early this decade has turned into an epic bust whose effects may take

item.title: 《房地产的繁荣与萧条》
item.description: 修订版序言 《纽约时报》的两位金融作家这样总结了住房和经济的当前形势： 传统上将经济带出衰退的房地产，这次似乎越来越有可能将经济拖入衰退。本世纪
